---
title: 'Support'
description: 'Get help and support for the Janus Python SDK'
---



## Contact Us

- **Email**: [team@withjanus.com](mailto:team@withjanus.com)

## Common Issues

### Installation Problems
If you're having trouble installing the SDK, make sure you have Python 3.8+ and pip installed.

### API Key Issues
Ensure your API key is properly set in your environment variables or configuration file.

### Documentation
Check our [quickstart guide](/quickstart) for step-by-step examples.

## Getting Started

If you're new to Janus, we recommend starting with our [quickstart guide](/quickstart) for practical examples.
